turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good Morning! I was hoping you could order a coffee drink for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Definitely! Do you have a specific location in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I love the local Starbucks inside the Safeway at 700 US-101, Florence, OR 97439

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They always make the drinks delicious!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm, I'm debating between a iced chai or hot coffee...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd love to have an iced chai please!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I love their almond milk!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, thank you for asking! I almost forgot, I love a little extra cinnamon in my chai!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That sounds great! Your drink is on order at the local store Starbucks and will be ready for pickup shortly and your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.
